# wholeSymbol

**Instance Property**

An effect that bounces all layers simultaneously.

## Declaration

```swift
var wholeSymbol: BounceSymbolEffect { get }
```

## Determining effect scope

- **byLayer**: An effect that bounces each layer separately.
